items.text: In the case that your transfer was paused due to loss of network connectivity, it will automatically resume when the network is available again.
items.href: Introducing the Transfer Utility for the AWS SDK for Android | Front-End Web & Mobile

items.text: Overall, we have built the Transfer Utility as an improvement and simplification over the Transfer Manager.
items.href: Introducing the Transfer Utility for the AWS SDK for Android | Front-End Web & Mobile
